domain

Class FFT

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.FFT

  • public class FFT
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for computing Fourier transform

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Complex[] fft(Complex[] x)
      Computes Fourier transform (FFT) using radix 2 Cooley-Tukey algorithm.
      static Complex[][] fft2(double[][] array)
      Computes 2D Fourier transform (FFT) in two steps.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • fft2

        public static Complex[][] fft2(double[][] array)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Computes 2D Fourier transform (FFT) in two steps. First it computes the one-dimensional FFT along rows. Then it computes the FFT of the output along columns.
        Parameters:
        array - A matrix of doubles
        Returns:
        The result as a matrix of Complex numbers
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • fft

        public static Complex[] fft(Complex[] x)
        Computes Fourier transform (FFT) using radix 2 Cooley-Tukey algorithm. Copyright © 2000–2017, Robert Sedgewick and Kevin Wayne. Ref: https://introcs.cs.princeton.edu/java/97data/FFT.java.html
        Parameters:
        x - An array of Complex numbers
        Returns:
        The fourier transformed array of Complex numbers
